General.Name: DIVA Laboratories Ltd
General.Description: DIVA Laboratories, Ltd. manufactures and sells display solutions worldwide. It provides endo/surgical displays, which provide static and dynamic images for hybrid and integrated ORs, and control room applications; color and mono displays for radiology and medical imaging; touch displays; and displays to ODM and OEM customers. The company is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 351, Zhongshan Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 235

5.Name: Jian Gen  Zhang
5.Title: Deputy Gen. Mang. of the Devel. Department and Director
